front.title: Layer 3 VPNs using Encapsulation Services Protocol

abstract.t: [RFC2547bis] defines a way to implement Layer 3 VPNs using BGP and MPLS. [GRE_IP_MPLS] shows a method to implement RFC 2547 style VPNs across a non-MPLS network. This document shows an alternative way of implementing Layer 3 VPNs in a non-MPLS network. Unlike [RFC2547bis], it does not require BGP either to be running on the PE.
